Whirling Assault.name: Whirling Assault
Whirling Assault.fullText:
Dervish of Dawn Attack 11Whirling Assault

You launch into a graceful, spinning dance as you close on your enemy. In the mesmerizing form of your dance, you free yourself from an enemy’s power and inspire your comrade as well.

Encounter        Divine, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You and one ally within 10 squares of you can each choose to do one of the following things:
• Make an escape attempt against a grab as a free action.
• Make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end and that dazes, immobilizes, slows, or stuns.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 21.
Whirling Assault.flavor: You launch into a graceful, spinning dance as you close on your enemy. In the mesmerizing form of your dance, you free yourself from an enemy’s power and inspire your comrade as well.
Whirling Assault.effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.
Whirling Assault.onHit:
2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. You and one ally within 10 squares of you can each choose to do one of the following things:
• Make an escape attempt against a grab as a free action.
• Make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end and that dazes, immobilizes, slows, or stuns.

Dance of Sunrise.name: Dance of Sunrise
Dance of Sunrise.fullText:
Dervish of Dawn Attack 20Dance of Sunrise

As you gracefully carry yourself across the battlefield, your weapon begins to gleam. For the rest of the fight, you glow with the hues of dawn, which scorch your foe with light.

Daily        Divine, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, your at-will attack powers against the target deal 1d8 extra radiant damage to it.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 21.
Dance of Sunrise.flavor: As you gracefully carry yourself across the battlefield, your weapon begins to gleam. For the rest of the fight, you glow with the hues of dawn, which scorch your foe with light.
Dance of Sunrise.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your at-will attack powers against the target deal 1d8 extra radiant damage to it.

Wild Hope.name: Wild Hope
Wild Hope.fullText:
Dervish of Dawn Utility 12Wild Hope

Your dance inspires you to wild ecstasy. Mortals cannot long endure such joy, but each time you strike your foe, new vigor flows into you.

Daily        Divine, Healing, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit one or more enemies with an attack, you regain hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. In addition, whenever you miss every target with an attack, you take 3 damage.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 21.
Wild Hope.flavor: Your dance inspires you to wild ecstasy. Mortals cannot long endure such joy, but each time you strike your foe, new vigor flows into you.
Wild Hope.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit one or more enemies with an attack, you regain hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. In addition, whenever you miss every target with an attack, you take 3 damage.
